1387919606120124418.name: Ari Paul
1387919606120124418.content: Most of the crypto world hasn’t adjusted to the new normal of mainstream.  We don’t realize just how big and fast the pie is growing and are squabbling over crumbs.  The entirety of crypto (by value, usage, # of holders) in 2016, is now being added to the industry *every month.*

1387912139814236166.content: If you think "UBI is only going to lead to a society of lazy people who don't want to work," take a look at all the people who made a bit of "free money" by investing in crypto. Few of those with windfalls are sitting around watching TV all day. They are building and creating.
